live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
41920.summary: Some customers in Dawson Creek and Fort St. John are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
41920.title: Sept 18 - Northern BC | All Service - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Work still continues in the area to get all services back online.  We thank you for your patience.
Some areas are starting to come back online while technicians continue with repairs and power is restored.
BC Hydro is still working to restore power to affected areas. Services will begin to come online as power is restored.
Services are still disrupted as Hydro outages are ongoing. Technicians are ready to ensure services are restored as quickly as possible once power is restored to an area.

41919.title: Sept 17 - Vancouver (Oakridge, Riley Park-Little Mountain) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Power has been restored and services are back online. Thanks for your patience and understanding.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
